description:
Kill me or release me, parasite.
But do not waste my time with talk!
TODO: What's the background for this? ...Maybe that special cutscene background will do...

initialDialogue.center:
Even if we could experience their world,
we would only get lost and die,
powerless and meaningless.

FAIRY, YOU DID…
something!
Way to go!
Is that… a friendly face? A human, here?
Fairy, your magic is amazing. You've purified… that. To reveal the human face beneath!
Or maybe this is a magical girl of justice, here to deliver us from eldritch evil.

NO ONE TELLS ME ANYTHING

SO WHO KNOWS

initialDialogue.warning:
I do.
 Are you looking for information?
initialDialogue.1: (Did it really call this body a magical girl?)

initialDialogue.warning:
Fairies and magical girls.
 What kind of place do you think this is?
 Give me something to work with:
        What are your first impressions?

funcs.dialogue: async function dialogue(words, at, momentum=undefined) { await Promise.all(words.map(w => api.window(w, at || [.05 + .9*Math.random(), .05 + .9*Math.random()], 32, momentum))) }
funcs.initialDialogue: async function initialDialogue() { const at=null;  for (let obj of level.initialDialogue) await Promise.all(Object.keys(obj).map(k => k !== 'js' ? dialogue([obj[k]], level.actors[k] ? k : null, level.actors[k] ? level.actors[k].momentum : undefined) : new Function(obj[k])())) }
funcs.main: async function main() { makeItEasier(), await initialDialogue(), api.levelLoad() }

onLoad: let s='';    for (let k in level.funcs) s += 'const '+k+'=level.funcs.'+k+'='+level.funcs[k]+'\n';    new Function('L', s+'\nreturn main()')(level)
onWon:
(async function() { api.levelSuggest('levels/x3/1.json'); 
 await api.window(`TODO:`, null, 32);  api.levelLoad('levels/x3/1.json') })()
